text: Justin Joshua Jefferson (born June 16, 1999) is an American football wide receiver for the Minnesota Vikings of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Louisiana State University. He was drafted by the Vikings in the first round of the 2022 NFL Draft ==References== ==Other websites== *Minnesota Vikings bio *LSU Tigers bio Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:American football wide receivers Category:Minnesota Vikings players
title: Justin Jefferson
